name: .WPROJ File Extension
summary: Learn about .WPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Project file created by Wwise, a program used for creating interactive audio for video games; saves sound settings and references to imported audio files; allows the sound engineer team to develop and organize sounds during game development.

content: WPROJ files are saved in an XML format. They are saved with several other directories and files that store audio assets and audio settings.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
